overview_of_class: This course will be part lecture course, part seminar, and will explore how the fields of neurobiology and molecular biology have converged to answer questions about the function of the central nervous system, in health and disease, and ethical considerations in the use of molecular biology techniques. Topics may include: Crispr-Cas9 system and gene editing; transgenic animals; molecular techniques employed to understand and treat neurological diseases such as Parkinson's disease and schizophrenia
name: Molecular Neurobiology
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 303-0-01 Molecular Neurobiology
